name: RUMBLE ASSAULT #4
description:
Rumble Assault is a small gig initiated by a collective group called Minortive in Bogor, an event that is held regularly every 3 months, apart from connecting the bands who are on tour with, we believe that with this collective we can make our city still exist and in range of road-tour friends in the underground Hardcore-punk scene. After being suspended for almost 2 years due to the Pandemic, this time it can be held again to welcome the tour of band from Bandung which has just released their debut album titled Ritus Hancur, namely AMETIS (https://ametis.bandcamp.com/). And a weekend tour from DURGA (https://mahabuas.bandcamp.com/) from our neighboring city, Cipanas.

Organized by Minortive & Suddendeath, located at Deeten Music Studio, Bogor.

Also with supporting act by
DEAFNESS (https://dfnss.bandcamp.com/releases)
BRIGHT(https://suddendeathrecords.bandcamp.com/album/ambivalent)
IS MODEST from Jakarta(https://ismodest.bandcamp.com/)

E-poster artwork by Loudsonic

All of sales will be use for collective operatinal during the event, the remaining unsold edition will be burnt on November 28th 2021
